languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на останки истлевающего демона, а затем — на уничтоженный {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g}. Складка на его лбу медленно разглаживается — лицо дознавателя выглядит почти что умиротворенным.{/n} "С творением {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g} покончено. Надеюсь, Фабрикатор-Цензор не успел передать тайны создания этой машины своим пособникам. И надеюсь, те, кто уцелел на нижних уровнях, сумеют продержаться до того, как мы освободим Кьяву Гамма".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на останки истлевающего демона, а затем — на уничтоженный {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g}. Складка на его лбу медленно разглаживается — лицо дознавателя выглядит почти что умиротворенным.{/n} "С творением {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g} покончено. Надеюсь, Фабрикатор не успел передать тайны создания этой машины своим пособникам. И надеюсь, те, кто уцелел на нижних уровнях, сумеют продержаться до того, как мы освободим Кьяву Гамма".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix stares at the smouldering ashes of the daemon, and then at the destroyed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The furrow on his brow slowly smooths out — his face looks almost contented.{/n} "The creation of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} is no more. I hope the Fabricator-Censor did not have time to pass on the secrets of this creature to his associates. And I hope that the survivors down on the lower levels can hold on until we liberate Kiava Gamma."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на останки истлевающего демона, а затем — на уничтоженный {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g}. Складка на его лбу медленно разглаживается — лицо дознавателя выглядит почти что умиротворенным.{/n} "С творением {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g} покончено. Надеюсь, Фабрикатор-Цензор не успел передать тайны создания этой машины своим пособникам. И надеюсь, те, кто уцелел на нижних уровнях, сумеют продержаться до того, как мы освободим Кьяву Гамма".

The furrow on his brow slowly smooths out — his face looks almost contented.{/n} "The creation of Chaos is no more. I hope the Fabricator did not have time to pass on the secrets of this creature to his associates. and I hope that the survivors down on the lower levels can hold on until we liberate Kiava Gamma."

The furrow on his brow slowly smooths out — his face looks almost contented.{/n} "The creation of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} is no more. I hope the Fabricator-Censor did not have time to pass on the secrets of this creature to his associates. and I hope that the survivors down on the lower levels can hold on until we liberate Kiava Gamma."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希盯着恶魔留下的燃灰，之后又盯着被摧毁的{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}。他眉头上的皱纹慢慢舒展开来，脸上几乎露出了心满意足的表情。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}的造物已经不在了，我希望铸造审查师并没有把这只怪物的秘密传递给他的同伙，我也希望下层区域的幸存者能坚持到我们解放基亚瓦伽马星为止。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at the smouldering ashes of the daemon, and then at the destroyed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The furrow on his brow slowly smooths out — his face looks almost contented.{/n} "The creation of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} is no more. I hope the Fabricator-Censor did not have time to pass on the secrets of this creature to his associates. And I hope that the survivors down on the lower levels can hold on until we liberate Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希盯着恶魔留下的燃灰，之后又盯着被摧毁的{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}。他眉头上的皱纹慢慢舒展开来，脸上几乎露出了心满意足的表情。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}的造物已经不在了，我希望铸造审查师并没有把这只怪物的秘密传递给他的同伙，我也希望下层区域的幸存者能坚持到我们解放基亚瓦伽马星为止。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix mira las cenizas humeantes del daemon y después el {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} destruido. Su ceño se alisa lentamente y parece casi satisfecho.{/n} «Esta creación del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g} ha dejado de existir. Espero que el fabricator-censor no tuviera tiempo de transmitir los secretos de esta criatura a sus camaradas. Y espero que los supervivientes de los niveles inferiores aguanten hasta que podamos liberar Kiava Gamma».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at the smouldering ashes of the daemon, and then at the destroyed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The furrow on his brow slowly smooths out — his face looks almost contented.{/n} "The creation of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} is no more. I hope the Fabricator-Censor did not have time to pass on the secrets of this creature to his associates. And I hope that the survivors down on the lower levels can hold on until we liberate Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix mira las cenizas humeantes del daemon y después el {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} destruido. Su ceño se alisa lentamente y parece casi satisfecho.{/n} «Esta creación del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g} ha dejado de existir. Espero que el fabricator-censor no tuviera tiempo de transmitir los secretos de esta criatura a sus camaradas. Y espero que los supervivientes de los niveles inferiores aguanten hasta que podamos liberar Kiava Gamma».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはディーモンの燃えさかる灰を、そして破壊された{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}を見つめていた。彼の眉間のしわはゆっくりと和らぎ、その顔は満ち足りているように見える。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}の創造物はもうありません。ファブリケーター・センサーに、この生物の秘密を仲間に伝える暇がなかったことを祈りたいものです。我々がキアヴァ・ガンマを解放するまで、下層にいる生存者が持ちこたえられることを願いましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at the smouldering ashes of the daemon, and then at the destroyed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The furrow on his brow slowly smooths out — his face looks almost contented.{/n} "The creation of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} is no more. I hope the Fabricator-Censor did not have time to pass on the secrets of this creature to his associates. And I hope that the survivors down on the lower levels can hold on until we liberate Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはディーモンの燃えさかる灰を、そして破壊された{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}を見つめていた。彼の眉間のしわはゆっくりと和らぎ、その顔は満ち足りているように見える。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}の創造物はもうありません。ファブリケーター・センサーに、この生物の秘密を仲間に伝える暇がなかったことを祈りたいものです。我々がキアヴァ・ガンマを解放するまで、下層にいる生存者が持ちこたえられることを願いましょう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix starrt auf die schwelende Asche des Dämons und dann auf den zerstörten {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g}. Die Falten auf seiner Stirn verschwinden langsam – er macht einen beinahe zufriedenen Eindruck.{/n} "Die Schöpfung des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} existiert nicht mehr. Hoffentlich hatte der Fabricator-Zensor keine Zeit, die Geheimnisse dieser Kreatur an seine Partner weiterzugeben, und ich hoffe auch, dass die Überlebenden in den unteren Ebenen noch durchhalten, bis wir Kiava Gamma befreit haben."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at the smouldering ashes of the daemon, and then at the destroyed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The furrow on his brow slowly smooths out — his face looks almost contented.{/n} "The creation of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} is no more. I hope the Fabricator-Censor did not have time to pass on the secrets of this creature to his associates. And I hope that the survivors down on the lower levels can hold on until we liberate Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix starrt auf die schwelende Asche des Dämons und dann auf den zerstörten {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g}. Die Falten auf seiner Stirn verschwinden langsam – er macht einen beinahe zufriedenen Eindruck.{/n} "Die Schöpfung des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} existiert nicht mehr. Hoffentlich hatte der Fabricator-Zensor keine Zeit, die Geheimnisse dieser Kreatur an seine Partner weiterzugeben, und ich hoffe auch, dass die Überlebenden in den unteren Ebenen noch durchhalten, bis wir Kiava Gamma befreit haben."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix fixe les cendres incandescentes du démon, puis tourne son regard vers les vestiges du {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g}. Ses sourcils froncés se relâchent progressivement, jusqu'à ce qu'il arbore une expression presque satisfaite.{/n} « La création du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} n'est plus. J'espère que le fabricator-censeur n'a pas eu le temps de transmettre les secrets de ce monstre à ses associés, et que les survivants des niveaux inférieurs pourront tenir jusqu'à ce que nous ayons libéré Kiava Gamma. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at the smouldering ashes of the daemon, and then at the destroyed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The furrow on his brow slowly smooths out — his face looks almost contented.{/n} "The creation of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} is no more. I hope the Fabricator-Censor did not have time to pass on the secrets of this creature to his associates. And I hope that the survivors down on the lower levels can hold on until we liberate Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix fixe les cendres incandescentes du démon, puis tourne son regard vers les vestiges du {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g}. Ses sourcils froncés se relâchent progressivement, jusqu'à ce qu'il arbore une expression presque satisfaite.{/n} « La création du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} n'est plus. J'espère que le fabricator-censeur n'a pas eu le temps de transmettre les secrets de ce monstre à ses associés, et que les survivants des niveaux inférieurs pourront tenir jusqu'à ce que nous ayons libéré Kiava Gamma. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in gözü, önce iblisin için için yanan küllerine, sonra da imha olmuş {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayara{/g} dalıyor. Kaşlarının ucundaki çizgiler, memnuniyete ermiş gibi yumuşayıp gidiyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos{/g} mahlukatı bertaraf oldu. Umarım Denetçi Fabrikatör, bu yaratığın sakladığı sırları iş birlikçilerine aktaracak vakti bulamamıştır. Ayrıca ümit ederim alt seviyede hayatta kalabilenler, biz Kiava Gama'yı kurtarana dek dayanabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at the smouldering ashes of the daemon, and then at the destroyed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The furrow on his brow slowly smooths out — his face looks almost contented.{/n} "The creation of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} is no more. I hope the Fabricator-Censor did not have time to pass on the secrets of this creature to his associates. And I hope that the survivors down on the lower levels can hold on until we liberate Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in gözü, önce iblisin için için yanan küllerine, sonra da imha olmuş {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g}a dalıyor. Kaşlarının ucundaki çizgiler, memnuniyete ermiş gibi yumuşayıp gidiyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos{/g} mahlukatı bertaraf oldu. Umarım Denetçi Fabrikatör, bu yaratığın sakladığı sırları iş birlikçilerine aktaracak vakti bulamamıştır. Ayrıca ümit ederim alt seviyede hayatta kalabilenler, biz Kiava Gama'yı kurtarana dek dayanabilir."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
